keyMoments.title: Take King Neptune Hostage
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates are forced to take King Neptune and his guards hostage as a tactical measure to survive when guards threaten to pop their air bubble.
keyMoments.significance: A crucial decision that makes them appear as criminals to Fish-Man Island's citizens, complicating their mission but ensuring their survival.

keyMoments.title: Branded as Criminals
keyMoments.description: News spreads throughout Fish-Man Island that the Straw Hat Pirates have occupied Ryugu Palace and taken King Neptune hostage, making them appear as criminals to the island's citizens.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a major misunderstanding that inadvertently helps Hody Jones' plan to turn the island against humans.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
